name: No Escape
overview: The objective is to find the pass card and use it a computer, then find the elevator to next floor/level. Caught short without his shoes, our hero bravely pads about a skyscraper dispatching psychotic terrorists and making a bit of a mess as he goes. You'll soon realized that nearly everything can be shot and the only way to find the best goodies is to start putting dents in the furniture.
